sentences.en: I am sometimes accused of being a poseur.
sentences.cn: 我有时被人说成是一个装模作样的人。

sentences.en: I am sometimes accused of being an inveterate poseur.
sentences.cn: 有时有人说我惯于装模作样。

sentences.en: I can tell he a poseur.
sentences.cn: 我看出他是个装模作样的人.
她是个装模作样的女孩.

sentences.en: Some people admired him greatly while others considered him a poseur.
sentences.cn: 有的人对他佩服得五体投地,而有的人则认为他装腔作势.

words.tran_cn: 难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事
装模作样的人；装腔作势的人

trans.tran_en: You can describe someone as a poseur when you think that they behave in an insincere or exaggerated way because they want to make a particular impression on other people
